item.description: DJ’s annual mini golf tournament got cancelled back in July, so we’re going to try again, and this time we have a plan B. Weather permitting, we will meet at Safari Golf on the Berlin Turnpike at 4:00 for our 18 holes and then for those who are interested, grab a bite to eat afterwards. If the weather is not conducive to outdoor activities, we’ll head to Monster Mini Golf on Route 159 in Windsor Locks (Exit 42 off I-91, take 159 north). Monster Mini Golf is indoor black light mini golf! Sounds like fun, doesn’t it. 4:00 PM meeting time also, and still the option to eat after.
item.how_to_find_us: DJ is our host and he's the one who is tall enough, but not old enough!
item.name: Mini Golf Redo
